description: Replacement of all existing single-glazed timber windows with double-glazed timber units to front side and rear elevations, and the replacement of the front and rear doors to match existing
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

2.	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the application documents: Design & Access Statement DA.OOI, DRG 002, DRG 003, DRG 004, DRG 005, DRG 006, DRG 007, DRG 008, DRG 009, DRG 010, DRG 012, DRG 013, DRG 014, DRG 015, DRG 016, DRG 017, DRG 018, DRG 019, DRG 020, DRG 021, DRG 022, DRG 023, DRG 024, DRG 025, DRG 026, DRG 027 (All received 22/02/2019), DRG-028 (received 15/05/2019), DRG-029 (received 15/05/2019), Horizontal Cross Section - revised casement detail (received 19/06/2019),
R/DRG 001 (Received 24/6/19), R/DRG 002, R/DRG 003, R/DRG 004, R/DRG 005, R/DRG 006 (All Received 24/6/19), email from Gary Maunders dated 13.06.2019
REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

3.	All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B, 7C, 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4, 7.6, and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016).
